articles.author: Mike Mahardy
articles.title: Baldur’s Gate 3’s OP trick involves stacking crates - Polygon
articles.description: In Larian Studio’s new CRPG, characters can carry heavy objects like crates, barrels, and chests. Stacking them lets your character reach tall ledges.
articles.content: In a game as dense and sometimes overwhelming as Baldurs Gate 3, its helpful to have a few go-to tricks up your sleeve. As Im nearing the end of the massive CRPGs first act, Ive found mine: the crate… [+2619 chars]
